about_the_game:
1. Welcome to the Carnival-themed demo of Capyverse Odyssey! Get ready to navigate spooky multiverses, fight enemies, and face the ultimate clown boss. Join forces with your first ally, the Seagull Squadron, and unleash chaos with special abilities and powerful weapons.

2. Game Modes

Solo Adventure: Take on eerie multiverses alone

Co-op: 2-4 players

3. Levels

  • Carnival of Chaos: A twisted circus filled with creepy clowns and deadly attractions.

  • Forgotten Graveyard: Battle through haunted tombstones and restless spirits in an eerie cemetery.

  • Neon Nights: A neon-lit cityscape full of sinister surprises and lurking foes.

  • Ribcage Island: An island littered with the bones of giant creatures, including dinosaur ribs.

4. Final Boss

Clown Boss: At the end of the journey, face the terrifying clown boss in a chaotic battle of wits and strength.

5. Capy Ally: Seagull Squadron

Your first ally is the mighty Seagull Squadron, a group of fearless aerial fighters:

  • Missile Special Ability: Launch homing missiles that strike enemies from above.

6. Capy's Abilities

  • Jetpack: Use Capy's jetpack for fast movement, allowing quick escapes and rapid positioning during intense battles.

  • Coconut Bomb: Drop explosive coconut bombs to cause area damage.

7. Weapons

  • Trumpet Shotgun: Dual-wield powerful trumpet shotguns to blast enemies at both close and long range.

  • Dragon Rifle: A high-powered long-range weapon that delivers fiery blasts, perfect for taking down tougher enemies.

8. Controls

Move: WASD
Shoot Weapon: Left click
Coconut Bomb: Right click
Special Ally Attack: Q
Switch Weapon: Scroll / 1 and 2
Jetpack: Shift for fast movement

9. Objective

Survive the four spooky levels, defeat hordes of enemies, and conquer the final clown boss to restore peace in the first multiverse.

10. Enemies

Each level is packed with unique Halloween-themed enemies, from zombie clowns to skeleton-neon minions, creepy crawlers, evil bumper cars, flying pumpkins and more. Watch out for their varied attacks and random patterns!

11. Power-ups

  • Weapon Boost: Increases damage for all equipped weapons and abilities.

  • Armor Upgrade: Provides additional protection by reducing incoming damage.

  • Health Boost: Restores health.

12. Tips & Tricks

  • Utilize Seagull Squadron: Their homing missile ability can be used to clear groups of enemies.

  • Weapon Mastery: Switch between the trumpet shotguns to handle different enemy types and ranges.

  • Jetpack Agility: Use the jetpack to move quickly and dodge enemy attacks or reposition in combat.

With all our hearts, we've crafted this Demo in the hopes that players will find joy and excitement in every corner of our expansive multiverses in the future game release.

We made this demo for you, hoping it'll give you some laughs, some edge-of-your-seat moments, and a bunch of good times.

Ready to help Capy save the Multiverse?

🤍🤍🤍

Play Free Demo

name: Capyverse Odyssey Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 / AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 / AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: A fast-paced, third-person action roguelike where you control Capy, a capybara hero, battling through chaotic multiverses to restore balance.
